title: Building Hope in Mexico
details: Join our team in Mexico to help build homes and provide essential resources for families in need. This mission trip will focus on construction, evangelism, and distributing supplies to impoverished communities.

title: Sharing the Gospel in Peru
details: This mission trip will take participants into the heart of Peru to engage in community outreach, evangelism, and support local churches through discipleship programs. We'll also assist in medical and educational efforts.

title: Reaching the Unreached in South Asia
details: Travel to South Asia to reach unreached people groups with the message of Jesus. This trip focuses on evangelism, discipleship, and equipping local believers to continue spreading the Gospel.

title: Serving the Local Community in Medford, OR
details: This mission trip focuses on serving the homeless and at-risk populations in Medford, Oregon. Participants will be involved in community service, outreach, and organizing support services for those in need.
